set.name: Mage Wars Academy: Beastmaster vs. Wizard

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Nature Magic. Fire spells cost triple SBP.

property.name: MageTraining
property.value: Training: Trained Arcane and Air Magic.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may make this attack against up to 3 different targets in the same zone. Damage from this attack is critical (ignores armor). Roll for each attack separately.

property.name: Text
property.value: This attack as the Sweeping trait, and can be used against two different targets.

property.name: Text
property.value: While making a counterstrike, Atticaran Porcupine gains Melee +2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Azurean Genie is summoned, place 3 Wish tokens on him. As his quick action, remove 1 Wish token and target a Living creature in his zone. The target gains Melee +2 this round, or Heals 2 damage, or gains the Stagger condition.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Jade Gremlin is melee attacked, as a Defense, you may pay 1 mana to have it avoid the attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, Lightning Raptor gains a Charge token, to a maximum of 5 tokens. X = the number of Charge tokens on him. If Lightning Raptor has 5 charge tokens, its attack gains the Counterstrike trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Mana Worm attacks and damages a creature, that creature's controller loses 1 mana (if he has any to lose).

property.name: Text
property.value: When Cockatrice makes a counterstrike, he gains Melee +1, and his Poisonous Bite attack gains Piercing +1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Living creature melee attacks Ridgeback Skunk, place a Stagger condition on that creature during the Counterstrike Step of that attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Satyr Gruff attacks and deals 4 or more damage to an enemy creature, place a Stagger condition on that creature.

card.name: Slavorg, Fang of the First Moon

property.name: Text
property.value: Slavörg costs 2 less mana for each animal creature in your discard pile. At the end of each of his activations, you may pay 2 mana to place a Guard marker on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Steelclaw Matriarch gains Melee +1 for each friendly Steelclaw Cub in her zone.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per round, if Wychwood Faerie is in your zone, you may pay 1 less mana if you cast an enchantment or an animal creature spell.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Wychwood Hound is in the same zone as another friendly Wychwood Hound, it gains Armor +1 and the Melee +1 trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you reveal Akiro's Game you gain 2 mana. During the Upkeep Phase, place a Stagger condition on the creature with the highest casting cost in this zone. If there is a tie, roll a die randomly to decide which creature is Staggered.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this object is the target of an incantation or enchantment spell, you must reveal Arcane Ward. That spell is countered (canceled without effect). Any mana spent to cast the spell is refunded to the caster. Then, destroy Arcane Ward.

property.name: Text
property.value: The next time this creature makes a quick melee attack, that attack gains the Doublestrike trait. At the end of that attack, destroy Badger Frenzy. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Badger Frenzy by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Divine Reversal. You may prevent up to 2 damage from that attack. After the attack, heal this creature 2 damage. Then, destroy Divine Reversal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dodge counts as a Defense and must be revealed when this creature is attacked. If this creature is a minor creature the attack is avoided. Otherwise, roll a d12: On a roll of 7+ the attack is avoided. Then destroy Dodge. [Defense 7+ 1x]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this creature activates you may reveal Exile and teleport this creature outside the arena (remove it from the play area with this enchantment attached). When this enchantment is destroyed, this creature returns to the same zone it came from. If this creature is Level 1, you may reduce the reveal cost of Exile by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Armor +1 and Life +2. [Armor +1] [Life +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Life +5 and Melee +2. [Life +5] [Melee +2]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this object is the target of an enemy controlled spell or attack, you may reveal Hoodwink: Gain 3 mana and then destroy Hoodwink. If Hoodwink is destroyed, even if hidden, you may place it back into your spellbook.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Life +2 and the Regenerate 1 trait. X = the creature's Level. [Life +2] [Regenerate 1]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains Melee +1. Whenever it is attacked and receives damage you must transfer 1 of that damage to your Mage instead. If this creature is destroyed you may pay 1 mana to move Joined Strength to a new target in your zone. [Melee +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, this creature's controller must pay 1 mana or the creature is destroyed. [Upkeep +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Elusive trait. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Panther Stealth by 1. [Elusive]

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Pest trait. When it attacks, it rolls 2 fewer attack dice (to a minimum of 1). X = the creature's Level.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature's melee attacks roll 1 less attack die (to a minimum of 1) for each Dissipate token on Tangleroot.

property.name: Text
property.value: This creature gains the Melee +1 trait, and its melee attacks gain Piercing +1. If this creature is Level 1, reduce the reveal cost of Wolf Fury by 1. [Melee +1] [Piercing +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: During the Upkeep Phase, you may heal up to 2 different animal creatures in your zone 1 damage each, by paying 1 mana per creature healed.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you attack and deal damage with this weapon, a friendly animal creature in your zone may gain Melee +1 until the end of the round. If this Mage is level 5 or greater, Johktari Hunting Knife rolls an additional attack die.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a friendly animal creature attacked and damaged the target this round, this attack gains 1 attack die.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Mage gains Armor +1. Once per round during this Mage's activation, he may choose a minor friendly animal creature in his zone, pay mana equal to their level, and place a Guard marker on that creature. [Armor +1]

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Mage is melee attacked, the attacker must pay 1 mana, or the attack is canceled. Has no effect on counterstrikes

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attack damages an enemy Non-Mage creature, that creature's controller loses 1 mana (if he has any to lose). If this Mage is level 5 or higher, Rod of the Arcanum rolls an additional attack die.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Mage gains Armor +1. Once per round, when an opponent pays or loses mana because of an effect you control, you gain 1 mana. [Armor +1][ReadyMarker]

property.name: Text
property.value: Whenever you remove a Dissipate token from Wispwillow Amulet, gain 1 mana.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Mage gains Armor +1 and the Regenerate 1 trait. [Armor +1] [Regenerate 1]

property.name: Text
property.value: Gain 2 mana. Destroy target equipment. X = the casting cost of target equipment.

property.name: Text
property.value: Destroy target enchantment. X = the reveal cost of target enchantment.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal each friendly Living creature in this zone the amount rolled on 2 attack dice. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Text
property.value: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice.
